welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stourbridge, where historic charm meets modern allure! Explore our renowned glassmaking heritage, picturesque canals, and vibrant town center, and immerse yourself in all the beauty our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport offers a variety of shops, restaurants, and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Birmingham Airport is primarily used for international flights and offers duty-free shopping and lounges for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'BHX Free WiFi' network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
